snippet.title: The Crossing - Debut Trailer (2008) | 720p
snippet.description:
This little gem in development by Arkane Studios, vanished off the face of the Earth a few years back. Originally to be published by Valve, The Crossing got put on hold due to fiscal problems incurred by the development studio . . . who has since been purchased by Zenimax, the same company which owns id Software and Bethesda Softworks, creators of Elder Scrolls and Fallout 3.

No one is quite sure what the ultimate fate of The Crossing will be. Does Valve still own the publishing rights to it, or did those rights switch over to Zenimax with the purchase of Arkane Studios. What is known however, is that Arkane is currently working on an "unknown" shooter, presumably using id Tech 5. Could this "unknown" shooter be an enhanced version of The Crossing, or could it be a new IP altogether? Who knows. But we most likely will find in June 2012 at E3.
